title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of E-learning? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 5 advantages of online learning is that learners can access information any time, place, when in need. Online content can be easier to update for current information. Videos can be watched repeatedly. Kids can ask questions anonymously. Transportation is not a barrier. The 16 disadvantages of online learners are in this book, Unschooling to University. They are: Relationships are difficult to maintain, and with content at one’s fingertips, relationships are a big part of school.Bussing. Kids are still being bussed to a school to learn online.Motivation needs monitoring.The learner still teaches himself but is constrained by the government agenda.The parent teaches the child but is constrained by the government agenda.Online learning only tickles two senses.Children need to move to learn.Online kids can’t handwrite.Virtual schools require technology supportTechnology creates errors.Parents are shut out of their child’s educationOnline education shifts the costs from the school to the homePoor contentOnline courses are designed to have a heavier student workloadSome components of learning are harder to accomplish on a screenPoorly organized courses.Excerpted from Unschooling To University
